system.description:
"Ever ready. That is what kawal must be. Now bring your weapons up. We have a datu to save." - War Leader Katuna, as he goes on to save a hostaged datu from a rival banwa. Kitasamba is the Guardian Lord of the Northeast, who guards those that have been untouched and are pure. His symbol is a newly blossomed passion flower, but his weapon is that of a hibiscus spiked shield.

Spend 1 Beat to raise your guard and take on the Guardian Stance until you make an attack. While in this Stance, all 8s on your Defense Teeth generates 2 Defends.

Charging Guardian God: +1 Beat to make it so that you may Rush 1 per 8 on Defense Teeth, after the attack.

Gnashing Dharmapala: +1 Beat to upgrade the stance: you can now convert every 1-3 on an attacker’s Attack Teeth against you into Hits against them while in the stance.
